import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { // columns = ['column 1', 'column 2', 'column 3', 'column 4']; columns = [ { id: 1, title: 'Students', count: '50055', img: '../../assets/images/icons/dash-icon-01.svg' }, { id: 2, title: 'Awards', count: '50+', img: '../../assets/images/icons/dash-icon-02.svg' }, { id: 3, title: 'Departments', count: '30+', img: '../../assets/images/icons/dash-icon-03.svg' }, { id: 4, title: 'Revenue', count: '$505', img: '../../assets/images/icons/dash-icon-04.svg' }, ]; activities = [ { icon: '../../assets/images/icons/award-icon-01.svg', title: '1st place in "Chess”', description: 'John Doe won 1st place in "Chess"', postingDate:'1 Day ago' }, ] }
